__e: Sir, there are lots of beautiful women here who say wonderful things about you!
Nothing at all, my son there are too many pretty women it's all their own fault
I'm not tired, I'm not dying and the truth is, I'm too old for beautiful women so I might as well be here.
Yeah, but on the plus side, you got some really pretty flowers.
We have a lot of pretty flowers, so take your time and look around.
I remember the beautiful flowers there.
Once, you asked if there might be a place for you around here, among the pretty things.
It's not for all these pretty things I can't see that I remain here.
I may not know much about you, but you sure know a lot of wonderful things about me.
Tells this cute little tattle-tales to sell his junk, but he don't sell no Yankee boys no truth.
I've seen some guys with some pretty tiny lady hands. Dan doesn't count.
But I'm sorry about the fat-ass thing because you have a sweet, little heinie.
Yeah, but the thing is um. what I wanted to tell you is um. all these pretty girls.
Fine my ass. Then why does your mother always ask me... if there are nice girls out there?
Do you know what happens to pretty girls like you in the war?
Do you think I'm terrible for keeping these really cute wedges?
Well... He's not wrong. They're cool shoes.
You could wear nice shoes, you know, because you were in the control room environment.
